comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: she appears to be a small coastal steamer

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: The Gregory, a steamship of the Booth Line, came to the rescue of the Oklahoma, which was wrecked on Sandy Hook on January 4, 1914. www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4690771132/ is of the captain of the Bavaria, another ship that rescued some of the few survivors. See NYT of January 7, 1914. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9F03E7DF1E39E633A...
